org.openscience.cdk.smsd.interfaces
Interface IMCSBase

All Known Implementing Classes:
CDKMCSHandler, CDKSubGraphHandler, MCSPlusHandler, SingleMappingHandler, VFlibMCSHandler, VFlibSubStructureHandler, VFlibTurboHandler
@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.smsd.interfaces.IMCSBaseTest")
public interface IMCSBase

Interface that holds basic core interface for all MCS algorithm.

Syed Asad Rahman

getAllAtomMapping

java.util.List<java.util.Map<IAtom,IAtom>> getAllAtomMapping()
Returns all plausible mappings between query and target molecules. Each map in the list has atom-atom equivalence of the mappings between query and target molecule i.e. map.getKey() for the query and map.getValue() for the target molecule

Returns:
All possible MCS atom Mappings

getAllMapping

java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> getAllMapping()
Returns all plausible mappings between query and target molecules. Each map in the list has atom-atom equivalence index of the mappings between query and target molecule i.e. map.getKey() for the query and map.getValue() for the target molecule

Returns:
All possible MCS Mapping Index

getFirstAtomMapping

java.util.Map<IAtom,IAtom> getFirstAtomMapping()
Returns one of the best matches with atoms mapped.

Returns:
Best Atom Mapping

getFirstMapping

java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getFirstMapping()
Returns one of the best matches with atom indexes mapped.

Returns:
Best Mapping Index
